utils package¶

Submodules¶

utils.environment module¶

utils.environment.set_environment(environment_variables)[source]¶

utils.isexe module¶

utils.isfile module¶

utils.which module¶

utils.which.which(program, program_name)[source]¶

Checks whether the file exists on the path or the system path

Module contents¶

Utils module provides a number of simple utility functions to the overall ancient_dna_pipeline package.

which - provides unix which functionality isexe - checks whether a file path is a executable isfile - checks whether a file path is points to an actual file.
